_watchComment: Directories and files to watch for changes
_extComment: File extensions to watch (TypeScript, JSON, GraphQL schemas, Prisma schema)
_ignoreComment: Files and directories to ignore (tests, build output, logs)
_execComment: Command to execute - tsx is faster than ts-node for ESM
_delayComment: Delay in ms before restarting after file change (prevents rapid restarts)
_verboseComment: Show detailed nodemon output for debugging
_legacyWatchComment: Use polling instead of native file watching (enable if having issues on Docker/WSL)
_restartableComment: Type 'rs' in terminal to manually restart
_envComment: Environment variables to set when running
_signalComment: Signal to use for graceful shutdown
